fw.name: ElecFlatteningItf

class.name: CATIEhfBundleSegmentLink
class.abstract: This Interface allows user to retrieve the information of the Support and/or the Mechanical Part through the Dashed Green Line.

method.name: ListLinkedMechanicalParts
method.abstract: Lists the Linked Mechanical Part through the Dashed Green Line.

method.name: ListLinkedSupports
method.abstract: Lists the Linked Supports through the Dashed Green Line.

class.name: CATIEhfEnvironment
class.abstract: This Interface allows you to find the Flattening Parameters used in " Electrical Harness Flattening " WorkBench.

method.name: CreateFlatteningParameters
method.abstract: Creates the flattening parameters.

method.name: GetFlatteningParameters
method.abstract: Retrieves the flattening parameters stored inside the product.

class.name: CATIEhfFlattenManager
class.abstract: This Interface allows you to extract harness data and flattened the extracted data.

method.name: ExtractHarness
method.abstract: Extract harness.

method.name: FlattenHarness
method.abstract: Flatten extracted data.

class.name: CATIEhfFlatteningParameters
class.abstract: This Interface allows you to access attributes of the Flattening Parameters used in " Electrical Harness Flattening " WorkBench.

method.name: GetAlgorithmMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the algorithm mode.

method.name: GetAngleMode
method.abstract: Retrieves the angle mode.

method.name: GetApplyReductionFactorToWholeBNS
method.abstract: Retrieves if the reduction factor is applied to the whole bundle segment (used only in case the bundle segments are scaled proportionally).

method.name: GetApplyScaling
method.abstract: Retrieves if the scaling is applied during the flattening step.

method.name: GetBNSTypeScaledDuringSync
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of bundle segments scaled during the synchronization step.

method.name: GetDeviceOrientation
method.abstract: Retrieves the device orientation during the flattening step.

method.name: GetExtractOnlySupportsInsideGBN
method.abstract: Retrieves if only the supports inside the geometrical bundle are extracted.

method.name: GetFixedLength
method.abstract: Retrieves the fixed length, if the bundle segment is longer than the fixed length then it will be reduced to equal the fixed length.

method.name: GetKeepTangents
method.abstract: Retrieves if the existing tangents between bundle segments and connectors are kept during flattening step.

method.name: GetLimitedLength
method.abstract: Retrieves the limited length under which the scaling is not applied.

method.name: GetMinAngleBetweenBranches
method.abstract: Retrieves the minimum angle between two branches.

method.name: GetMinNumberOfBNSToApplyScaling
method.abstract: Retrieves the minimum number of bundle segments required in the harness to apply the scaling.

method.name: GetMoveIntermediatePtDuringSync
method.abstract: Retrieves if the intermediate points are moved during the synchronization step.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of the flattening parameters.

method.name: GetPlane
method.abstract: Retrieves the active plane stored inside the flattening parameters.

method.name: GetReductionFactor
method.abstract: Retrieves the reduction factor (used only in case the bundle segments are scaled proportionally).

method.name: GetScaleBNSProportionally
method.abstract: Retrieves if the bundle segments are scaled Proportionally.

method.name: GetSupportOrientation
method.abstract: Retrieves the support orientation during the flattening step.

method.name: SetAlgorithmMode
method.abstract: Sets the algorithm mode.

method.name: SetAngleMode
method.abstract: Sets the angle mode.

method.name: SetApplyReductionFactorToWholeBNS
method.abstract: The reduction factor is applied to the whole bundle segment (used only in case the bundle segments are scaled proportionally).

method.name: SetApplyScaling
method.abstract: Applies the scaling during the flattening step.

method.name: SetBNSTypeScaledDuringSync
method.abstract: Sets the type of bundle segments scaled during the synchronization step.

method.name: SetDeviceOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the device orientation during the flattening step.

method.name: SetExtractOnlySupportsInsideGBN
method.abstract: Allows to extract only the supports inside the geometrical bundle.

method.name: SetFixedLength
method.abstract: Sets the fixed length,if the bundle segment is longer than the fixed length then it will be reduced to equal the fixed length.

method.name: SetKeepTangents
method.abstract: Allows to keep existing tangents between bundle segments and connectors are kept during flattening step.

method.name: SetLimitedLength
method.abstract: Sets the limited length under which the scaling is not applied.

method.name: SetMinAngleBetweenBranches
method.abstract: Sets the minimum angle between two branches.

method.name: SetMinNumberOfBNSToApplyScaling
method.abstract: Sets the minimum number of bundle segments required in the harness to apply the scaling.

method.name: SetMoveIntermediatePtDuringSync
method.abstract: Moves the intermediate points during the synchronization step.

method.name: SetName
method.abstract: Sets the name of the flattening parameters.

method.name: SetPlane
method.abstract: Sets the active plane stored inside the flattening parameters.

method.name: SetReductionFactor
method.abstract: Sets the reduction factor (used only in case the bundle segments are scaled proportionally).

method.name: SetScaleBNSProportionally
method.abstract: Scales bundle segments proportionally.

method.name: SetSupportOrientation
method.abstract: Sets the support orientation during the flattening step.

class.name: CATIEhfLengthTolerance
class.abstract: This Interface CATIEhfLengthTolerance allows to manage the Length Tolerance object.

method.name: GetFixExtremity
method.abstract: Retrieves the Fix extremity of the Length Tolerance.

method.name: GetMoveExtremity
method.abstract: Retrieves the Move extremity of the Length Tolerance.

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of the Length Tolerance.

method.name: GetPortionLength
method.abstract: Retrieves the length of the segment portion where the Length Tolerance was applied.

method.name: GetToleranceValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the value of applied Length Tolerance.

method.name: SetToleranceValue
method.abstract: to set the value of Length Tolerance.

class.name: CATIEhfManageLengthTolerance
class.abstract: This Interface CATIEhfManageLengthTolerance allows to manage the creation, removal and retrieve of Length Tolerance objects on a Branch.

method.name: CreateLengthTolerance
method.abstract: This method allows to create Length Tolerance on a Branch.

method.name: ListOfLengthTolerance
method.abstract: This method allows to provide the list of Length Tolerance on the selected branch.

method.name: RemoveLengthTolerance
method.abstract: This method allows to remove the applied Length Tolerance on branch.

class.name: CATIEhfPrdWkbCfgAddin
class.abstract: Interface to add toolbars in the 'Electrical Harness Flattening' workbench.

class.name: CATIEhfUIPArrangeJunction
class.abstract: This Interface CATIEhfUIPArrangeJunction allows “Arrange Junction – User Pattern” command to be implemented by user for the definition of his own branch arrangement rules.

method.name: RetrieveUserDirection
method.abstract: User has to provide the implementation for this method when he implements this interface on CAAEhfArrangeJunction component.

class.name: CATIEhfUIPLengthTolerance
class.abstract: This Interface CATIEhfUIPLengthTolerance allows “Arrange Junction – User Pattern” command to be implemented by user for the definition of his own branch arrangement rules.

method.name: ExportLengthToleranceInfo
method.abstract: User has to provide the implementation for this method when he implements this interface on CAAEhfLengthTolerance component.
